title: Shetland - S01 to 03 - Crime Drama - Xvid - Slimoo
description:
Shetland - Drama - Xvid - Slimoo
 



=================================================
 
A murder mystery set against the stunning Scottish backdrop of the Shetland Isles.

 
 


1/2 DI Jimmy Perez investigates when elderly Shetlander Mima Wilson is murdered.
 
2/2 Can Perez and his team arrest the suspect before crowds descend on the Shetland Islands? 
 
 

 
1/6 Old wounds are painfully reopened for the shocked residents of Ravenswick. 
 
2/6 DI Jimmy Perez believes he and his team are finally closing in on the killer. 
 
3/6 An old acquaintance of DI Perez dies in a suspicious car accident on the island. 
 
4/6 A second body is found. Detective Inspector Perez wonders if the killings are connected. 

5/6 Perez returns to his childhood home after the murder of a scientist on Fair Isle.

6/6 Time is running out for DI Perez as prime suspect Peter Latimer lies ill in hospital.

 


1/6 A young man disappears on the Aberdeen to Shetland ferry crossing. 

2/6 DI Perez is convinced that Michael Maguire is implicated in the death of Robbie Morton.

3/6 Perez and Tosh go to Glasgow as they try to uncover the reasons behind Maguire's death.

4/6 Perez and his team are determined to track down the person who helped the killer. 

5/6 Perez struggles to deal with what has happened to Tosh.

6/6 The murderer of Robbie Morton and Michael Thompson is closer to home than was thought. 




 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p01s711r
